reference.shortdesc: The glossProperty element is a specialization of the data element. You can use it to specify additional details about the preferred term or its subject, for example, the gender of a noun.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The glossProperty element is specialized from data; it is defined in the glossary entry module.

example.title: Example
